a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Coal production per capita over the long-term, 1700 to 2016
Average coal production per capita over the long-term, measured in megawatt-hour (MWh) equivalents per
Data source: Long-term per capita fossil fuels - OWID based on UN, Gapminder, BP, Etemad & Luciana
